content.query:
DECLARE @jsonStr VARCHAR(MAX);
DECLARE @langStr VARCHAR(MAX);
DECLARE @AgentStr VARCHAR(100);
SELECT @jsonStr=
     JSON_QUERY(jsonContent, '$.Results') 
     FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://dlssynap1.dfs.core.windows.net/lf-data/calisto/agent/AgentData_20211111000000.JSON',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
    ;
     with cte1 AS (
SELECT * FROM  
 OPENJSON ( @jsonStr )  
WITH (   
              AgentNumber   varchar(200) '$.AgentNumber'  ,
              LanguageSet nvarchar(MAX) N'$.LanguageSet' AS JSON  ,
              LicenseSet nvarchar(MAX) N'$.LicenseSet' AS JSON  
 )   
    )
    /*
SELECT *
FROM cte1;
*/

SELECT AgentNumber, LicenseSet.LicensePCNumber ,  LicenseSet.PrimaryLic, LanguageSet.Language
FROM cte1  
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON(cte1.LicenseSet)--, '$.LicenseNumber')   
     WITH (LicensePCNumber VARCHAR(500)  '$.LicensePCNumber',
            PrimaryLic VARCHAR(500)  '$.PrimaryLicense'
     ) AS LicenseSet
OUTER APPLY OPENJSON(cte1.LanguageSet)--, '$.LicenseNumber')   
     WITH (Language VARCHAR(500)  '$.Language' ) AS LanguageSet     
     order by AgentNumber
